content.raw:
Yeah you're right I'll fix that.

I think that this should be raised as a warning to indicate that your script isn't written 100% correctly. It will still compile so there should be no harm in it.

I know it's a temporary fix but no one knows how long it will be and this could solve some problems until then.
content.html:
Yeah you're right I'll fix that.

I think that this should be raised as a warning to indicate that your script isn't written 100% correctly. It will still compile so there should be no harm in it.

I know it's a temporary fix but no one knows how long it will be and this could solve some problems until then.
